activities: Our company provides document hosting and a review platform for law firms and corporate clients to review documents subject to litigation. This can include documents with personally identifiable private information. All documents are hosted on our secure platform and are only available to authorized users approved by the client providing the data. At no point will any documents be produced without explicit request and permission from authorized client users.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
orgverification: Third Party: BBB EU Safe Harbor
personaldata: Our company organizes, stores, and processes documents for legal review by our clients. This includes a variety of documents, such as emails, memos, and various other computer files. At no point will any documents be produced without explicit request and permission from authorized client users. These are all covered under our Safe Harbor certification.
